about_the_game:
while True: learn() soundtrack explores the synergy between human arrangement and AI generation of pulses and tones. The AI component is based on patterns of machine learning and results in a blend of programming and contemplation.

Composed by Vladislav Isaev and Elena Isaeva (Broadcast Of Variants) at Monokanal.

High-Quality WAV 1411kbps + Super-Compact MP3 192kbps

To play the Soundtrack please find "while True: learn() Soundtrack" in your Steam Library.
